News

Announcements, paper acceptances, talks, and lab highlights.

2025

  1. Our paper on shape bias was accepted at ICCV
    July 1, 2025 Conference

    Our work on cue decomposition improves robustness assessments by isolating shape vs. texture signals. We will present it at ICCV.

    Paper Project page

  2. Invited talk at the Autonomous Systems Seminar
    May 10, 2025 Talk

    Matthias Rottmann discussed uncertainty calibration for safety-critical perception pipelines.

    Slides

2024

  1. Launching the OoDIS benchmark
    November 20, 2024 Dataset

    We released a new instance-level open-set benchmark for complex urban scenes, focusing on rare and hazardous objects.

    Website GitHub Paper
